name: And Then
tagline: WordPress plugin for executing an action after Updating/Publishing any post type
body:
### Actions
* Edit this [post]
* Add this [post]
  * if post type is hierarchical: Make same parent
  * Increment order
* View this [post]
* Go to:
  * Dashboard
  * Post screens
  * Media Library
  * Appearance/Menus
  * Appearance/Widgets
  * Network Dashboard
  * Network Sites

### Provided as-is; be free to fork and create and implement your own actions, and share them with others!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
